dataaccesslayer

Interface GradeDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GradeDaoImpl

    public interface GradeDao
    An interface for accessing and manipulating Grade data in the database. Assignment 2 Class: CST8288 - Lab Section: 013 Lab Professor: Siju Philip Date: Mar. 30, 2023

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGrade(GradeDTO grade)
      Adds a new grade to the database.
      void deleteGrade(GradeDTO grade)
      Deletes an existing grade from the database.
      java.util.List<GradeDTO> getAllGrade()
      Retrieves a list of all grades in the database.
      GradeDTO getGradeByStudentIdCourseCode(int studentId, java.lang.String courseCode)
      Retrieves a GradeDTO object from the database by student ID and course code.
      void updateGrade(GradeDTO grade)
      Updates an existing grade in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllGrade

        java.util.List<GradeDTO> getAllGrade()
        Retrieves a list of all grades in the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all GradeDTO objects in the database.

      • getGradeByStudentIdCourseCode

        GradeDTO getGradeByStudentIdCourseCode(int studentId,
                                       java.lang.String courseCode)
        Retrieves a GradeDTO object from the database by student ID and course code.
        Parameters:
        studentId - the ID of the student whose grade is being retrieved.
        courseCode - the code of the course for which the grade is being retrieved.
        Returns:
        a GradeDTO object for the specified student and course, or null if no grade was found.

      • addGrade

        void addGrade(GradeDTO grade)
        Adds a new grade to the database.
        Parameters:
        grade - the GradeDTO object to add.

      • updateGrade

        void updateGrade(GradeDTO grade)
        Updates an existing grade in the database.
        Parameters:
        grade - the GradeDTO object to update.

      • deleteGrade

        void deleteGrade(GradeDTO grade)
        Deletes an existing grade from the database.
        Parameters:
        grade - the GradeDTO object to delete.
